text: To uteweardum handum, gif hit mæssepreost bið, and to innewardum handum, gif hit læwede man sy.
And þonne hy gesmyrede beoð, do him man linene glofan buton ælcon þymule on handa and hæbbe hy oð þone eahteoðan dæg, gif his lif swa langsum bið.
And gif he forðfare, hæbbe hy mid him to byrgenne.
